author: Deleted User
content: Did ETH ever have a talk about being in hybrid mode, PoW and PoS say 50/50, before full transition into PoS? And yes, this is kind of late. https://ycharts.com/indicators/ethereum_transactions_per_day

author: timbeiko
content:
The quality of this channel has degraded over the past weeks. Many contributors have reached out to me about this and I’ve also found myself skipping past entire conversations because the signal/noise ratio is poor. 

I would **really** like to avoid any sort of whitelisting on here because many community members do provide very valuable contributions. That said, we want this to be a channel that people on client teams constantly monitor and it’s really hard to do that if a large % of messages aren’t useful to them. 

Please ask yourself before posting whether your comment is something every client dev should be aware of. If not, try and use another channel. Thanks!

author: 0xsadcat
content: I think there should be an offtopic channel as a place for less technical messages. Then devs can just ignore it. If you whitelist this channel it's only going to move into other channels with some specific purpose, whitelisting is only going to work if it's server wide.
